entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove shipping code from runtime-assets #60273
  • Mono leaks native errno value during UnmanagedCallersOnly prolog/epilog #60271
  • FileStream.Write is slower than WriteFile #60268
    Future
  • Two `System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendPacketsAsync` tests failing on `Windows x64 debug` #60267
  • [mono] Improvement: avoid deep recursion in mono_ssa_rename_vars #60266
    7.0.0
  • HTTP/3 request HttpContent cancellation is different from HTTP/2 #60253
  • Freeze/lock of dotnet process in net 5 mac #60252
  • Loading Native Images for corresponding assemblies from custom cache transparently #60250
  • The size of dotnet.wasm(Blazor AOT) is big and it causes the performance issues #60249
  • Webassembly performance problems in aot+interp mode #60247
    7.0.0
  • WebAssembly native dependency builds incrementalism is still slow #60245
  • Intercept the function calls at runtime #60243
    7.0.0
  • Failed to compile CLR #60241
  • Test failure System.Tests.ConsoleKeyInfoTests.Equals_SameData(cki: System.ConsoleKeyInfo) #60240
  • Test failure SampleSynthesisTests.SynthesizeRecognizeTests.SpeechRecognitionEngineProperties #60239
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\Benchstones\\BenchF\\NewtE\\NewtE\\NewtE.cmd #60238

Closed

  • JsonDeserializer throws when a C#9 record declare additional constructors #45373
    Future
  • Is there some best practice on prettify a json string #59622
  • BackgroundService that doesn't call base.StartAsync leads to NullReferenceException - .NET 6 breaking change #60131
    6.0.0
  • Consider removing `CROSSGEN_COMPILE` define and the CrossGen binary #53007
    7.0.0
  • [System.Text.Json] Write to pooled array(s) #29872
    Future
  • Could SortedSet.InOrderTreeWalk use recursion instead of allocating? #18769
    Future
  • [Android] System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates ExportCertificatePems_MultiCert Failure #59777
    7.0.0
  • WebSocket Client does not respond to ping\pong messages #60171

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #60275
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Reflection Invoke share more coreclr/mono #60270
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Reflection
  • Use Span.Fill in String(Char, Int32) constructor #60269
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono/win] Increase stack size (reserve) to 8MB #60265
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono/win] Build native runtime as Debug again #60263
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix a few more ASAN-exposed issues #60262
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move the Libraries Enterprise Linux pipeline off Ubuntu 16.04 #60261
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Fixing compilation on windows using debug mode. #60260
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Update SDK to 6.0 RC2 #60256
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix the accounting for gen 1 allocations by taking into account what … #60248
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Updating named mutex design docs #60246
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [QUIC] Fixed exception type for ConnectionShutdownInitiatedByTransport #60244
    area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Change GC state explicitly #60242
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Merged

  • Build using `build.cmd/sh`, not `bootstrap.cmd/sh` #60264
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix runtime-staging trigger and one bug #60257
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Backport of changes to support x64 on arm64 #60208
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • Disable ClearPreviousError test on Mono #60272
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fallback to read/write if pread/pwrite fails #59846
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] Disable System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.Tests, till they… #60258
    arch-wasm, disabled-test
  • [release/6.0] Fix issue in decommit_ephemeral_segment_pages (segment case). #60170
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder/Loader area #59590
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Re-enable running DllImportGenerator.Tests suite on Mono. #60259
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [reflection] Return n2m wrapper from RuntimeMethodHandle.GetFunctionPointer #60200
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [QUIC] Fixed exception type for ConnectionShutdownInitiatedByTransport #60181
    area-System.Net.Quic, 7.0.0
  • [release/5.0] Disable FromHwnd* tests failing on CI #60202
    area-System.Drawing
  • Add runtime-community.yml pipeline and add s390x job #60255
  • Fix GetGenerationWithRange when we have a gen 2 object in the ephemeral segment (#60189) #60207
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr
  • Reenable ExportCertificatePems_MultiCert test on Android #60251
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • make System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs conform to interop guidelines #59913
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Remove assert preventing empty PKCS7 exports #59812
    area-System.Security, os-android, community-contribution
  • Fix test sensitivity to PKCS7 certificate ordering #59818
    area-System.Security, os-android, community-contribution
  • fallocate sets errno on error, posix_fallocate did not #60185
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add C# multi-dimension array versions of the Benchstones tests #60192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix: CTS.TryReset() concurrency issue #60182 #60224
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable ASAN for CoreCLR #54580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Issue 55685 processname optimisation #59672
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Optimize ReadOnlyTernaryTree for System.Private.Xml #60076
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Prevent runtime prop metadata retrieval when [JsonIgnore] is used #60024
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Pick up a new build of Xunit #60044
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add SetLastError to GdiPlus methods (#59096) #60201
    Servicing-approved
  • Enable outerloop helix legs on the "runtime-coreclr outerloop" pipeline. #57068
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • FileSystemEntry.Unix: ensure properties are available when file is deleted. #60214
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • HTTP2 loopback server WaitForCancellationAsync should validate error code sent #59313
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Do not throw StackOverflow exception from `ChangeToken.OnChange` #60198
    area-Extensions-Primitives
  • Fix VS4Mac crash report and core dump generation perf problems #60205
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Follow up on Scatter/Gather API changes #58447
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Test fix: FileStream DeleteOnClose run on OuterLoop with longer timeout #60149
    area-System.IO
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration` #57414
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add API entry for JsonDocument converter #60236
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Updating and fixing unit tests for DirectoryServices.AccountManagement #56670
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fixing update issue with multivalued properties #34267 #56696
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix short branches #58806
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Finish59071 update ci argsh for r6.0 #60100
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.0
  • [draft fix for 43752] Mark PLINQ as enabled in WASM and make browser compat changes #58227
    arch-wasm, area-System.Linq.Parallel
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize redundant memory barriers on arm/arm64 #60219
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unify set-reg-to-imm functions and optimize with LEA at runtime on x64 #60228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CreateDirectory: eliminate some syscalls. #58799
    area-System.IO
  • Better codegen for `(T)x | (T)y` #58727
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • lateapexearlyspeed-issue-30778 Create method: TryReadExact(). #57921
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Consume PGO information in the compiler #569
  • Support IDynamicInterfaceCastable #162

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Question: Determine from clrjit if a struct contains a GC pointer #1647

PullRequests

Merged

  • Expose --make-repro-path option #1648
    area-NativeAOT

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Add more helper calls (converstions and cast) #1645

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Better error message for missing workloads? #21956
  • dotnet workload commands that fail leave the sdk in a bad state #21953
  • [Breaking change] For `dotnet test`, switch `-r` to alias `--runtime` instead of `--results-dir` #21952
  • react template fails out of the box with 5.0.401 #21949

Closed

  • Xamarin Android versionCode gets set to 1 regardless of value in manifest #21614

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable signing of tools host on mac (#21894) #21958

Merged

  • Prevent browser refresh script from injecting into iframes #21954
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • Enable signing of tools host on mac #21894
    6.0.1xx

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #21199
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use NuGetPackageVersion in dotnet.*.js file name #21919
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21885
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update the default language version for Visual Basic/VB to 16.9 #57093
  • Produce Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections NuGet package during source-build #57092
  • Add project reference should handle multi-targeting projects better #57090
  • "is new()" crashes csc.exe #57088
    17.1
  • Add explicit cast on -= operator produces wrong code #57085
  • Crash in compilation tracker source generator handling. #57082
    17.1
  • 'ExtractMethodCodeRefactoringProvider' encounters error and is disabled #57079
  • "Move type to file" can bring along #endregion directive, resulting in non-compiling code #57077
  • How to target specific framework/core versions when building with CSharpCompilation #57075

Closed

  • 'Build.cmd -testCoreClr' is broken #46608
    Backlog
  • Investigate use of MemoryMappedInfo after disposal #56305
    17.0.P5
  • IDE0130 message "Namespace 'Foo' does not match folder structure, expected 'Foo'" #55550
    17.0
  • IntraTextAdornments conflict with intellicode line completion proposals #55631
    17.0
  • Switch expression inside function pointer invocation results in NotImplementedException #55394
    17.1
  • Need compiler to expose some way to get the information about CheckForBitwiseOrSignExtend #56977
    17.1
  • Expose API to signify if an `or-expression` (`|`) surprisingly widened a sign extended value. #56994
    17.1
  • Potential bug with Remove Unused Variable #56924
    17.1
  • Removal of a unnecessary cast causes 'unintended reference comparison' warning. #57065
  • NRT issue in new cast simplifier #57064
  • Cast removal issue with new cast simplifier #57063
  • ?. operator + out parameter can break definite assignment analysis #57072

PullRequests

Created

  • Inline Diagnostics: fix rps regression #57094
    Area-IDE
  • Fix 'T is new()' crash #57091
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57086
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update extract method to support top-level statements #57084
    Area-IDE
  • Fix analysis of MemberNotNullWhen in patterns #57083
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Remove cast tweak cases from https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/57061 #57080
    Area-IDE
  • Support params Span<T> #57078
    Area-Compilers
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Go To Definition from source information in PDBs #57073
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required

Merged

  • Increment prerelease version prior to GA #57089
    Area-Infrastructure
  • TupleBinaryOperatorInfo.Single - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand conversion. #57081
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • BoundFixedLocalCollectionInitializer - use BoundConversion nodes to represent element pointer conversion. #57038
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • BoundConvertedSwitchExpression - do not store Conversion in the node. #57022
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • BoundForEachStatement - use BoundConversion nodes to represent conversions in the node. #57010
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • BoundAsOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #56941
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update PublishData.json #57087
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add a remote-control flag to disable storing runtime metadata assemblies weakly. #57036
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Record status for "Semi-auto-properties" #57013
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Separate global and solution completion options #57033
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57039
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Handle switch expressions inside function pointer invocations. #56991
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Disable completion latency guards for integration tests #57044
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Run 'remove unnecessary cast' on Workspaces layer. #57061
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Allow fixing valid unused variables nested inside bad local declarations #56955
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix cast simplification issues #57066
    Area-IDE, Next
  • List patterns: add more tests and fix nullability analysis #53822
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1
  • Add control tower flag for disabling the project cache service. #57060
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix 'use pattern combinators' so it won't generate nullable pattern checks #57074
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57097
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57096
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #57095
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Null annotate FileCodeModel and the code model service #57026
    Area-IDE
  • BoundNullCoalescingOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent left operand conversion. #54538
    Area-Compilers
  • Move to a singleton storage service per process, instead of per workspace. #56916
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers
  • Add a remote-control flag to allow us to effectively disable branch-ids #57034
    Area-IDE
  • Add experiment to disable weak compilation refs in the compilation tracker #57037
    Area-IDE
  • Fix crash for top-level in unused value analyzer #51761
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Refactoring of completion providers for embedded languages #57071
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Fix #55183: Add SymbolVisitor<TArgument, TResult> #56530
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.1
  • Fix named mutex workaround for .NET Mono runtime #57003
    Area-Compilers
  • Check constraints on lifted operator types #57050
    Area-Compilers
  • Error when ref is used on a parameter or return type of an UnmanagedCallersOnly method #57043
    Area-Compilers
  • Codefix for CS1591: Add ///<inheritdoc/> #57004
    Area-IDE, Community
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • Don't specifically dismiss the sig help session on down key press #51241
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Log message in RazorSdk will throw exception due to incorrect parameter number #37467
  • [Performance] Investigate bi-modality of some benchmarks #37465
  • Error after adding UseWindowsService and publishing #37464
  • [ANCM] Add support for equivalent of disallowRotationOnConfigChange #37463
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Startup regression: plaintext #37460
  • Perf regression: mvc #37459
  • Templates.Test.GrpcTemplateTest.GrpcTemplate #37457
  • Update readmes to indicate the correct node JS version to use #37456
  • dotnet watch stops detecting changes, crashes and corrupts terminal #37462
  • Accessibility issue #37455
    6.0.0
  • Adding user secrets documentation outdated. #37450
  • [Blazor] Disable running components E2E tests on Quarantined tests pipeline #37443
  • Building tag v6.0.0-rc.2.21480.10 fails installing dotnet #37442
  • [SignalR] Autobahn-like test suite for SignalR #37440
    Backlog
  • [SignalR] retryContext in withAutomaticReconnect to expose more http context #37439
  • Startup improvement: caching, multiple_queries #37438
  • Blazor should have something like an angular directive #37437
  • Unable to load shared library 'urlmon.dll' on linux environment #37436
  • Feature Request: Custom View Component View paths #37435
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Feature Request: View Component Slots #37434
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Make Matcher & MatcherFactory public interfaces #34916
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: updates #37427
  • Ship current rate limiting abstractions and implementations from asplabs to an internal transport feed. #37382
    7.0-preview1
  • MinLength, MaxLength and <select> #37371
  • '400 Bad Request' when connect some domains that contains '-' #37421
    7.0-preview1
  • [Build][Helix] Use node version 16.x #37453
  • Support C#-like partially qualified components #37197
  • Inline style/script blocks #37304
  • Feature Request/Question: Ability to easily author/inject new directives for Razor? #37302
  • Component Named With Lowercase Letter Error Should Open Component #37305
  • Remove RazorPageGenerator from dotnet/aspnetcore-tooling #20474
  • Remove obsolete RazorEngine APIs in Razor #19304
  • Tag Helpers rendered incorrectly when Razor comment block is present #18921
  • Blazor / RCL - generated files not reflecting renaming / refactoring #13884
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Blazor] Unfortunate parameter naming #37181
    6.0.0
  • Change the defaults for OpenIdConnectOptions.ResponseType #37328
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Single file build time regression: plaintext #37428
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_actix #37349
  • Perf improvement: json, json_nodejs #37378
  • Blazor - The input is flickered while typing speedy into the input in azure hosted #37067
  • StateHasChanged () does not work in Blazor server app #37193

PullRequests

Created

  • `<Virtualize>` Fixing `data-fetching` when horizontal scrolling is present on table layout #37451
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/6.0] HTTP/3: Abort connection on unexpected exception from AcceptStream #37461
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.0
  • [release/3.1] Backport x64 on ARM64 installer changes #37409
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure
  • [release/5.0] Backport x64 on ARM64 installer changes #37407
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure
  • Update template tests to capture information #37447
    area-mvc
  • Support "-" in authority hosts #37429
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • HTTP/3: Abort connection on unexpected exception from AcceptStream #37432
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix IDE0059 suggestion #37430
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • HTTP/3: Fix tests failing because of new error code #37433
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3b49be0` to `075810f` #37444
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [Infrastructure] Update nodejs to use node 16 #37454
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Improve project reference consistency #37338
    area-infrastructure
  • Refresh BuildFromSource docs #37362
    area-infrastructure
  • Add / update PR templates #37412
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Update gRPC template reference to Grpc.AspNetCore #37229
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 6.0.0
  • Added nullable overload for markupString #37265
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Fix #37340 by guarding the initial ping for SignalR #37414
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Fix ResourceManagerStringLocalizerFactory caching #33129
    area-mvc
  • Set the `aria-invalid` attribute to "true" instead of true. #37423
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fixes #37340 #37417
    area-signalr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: Non-tracking query doesn't throw for null keys #26310
    7.0.0

Closed

  • OnDelete not generated correctly in migration #26303

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MacOs installer resources are unlocalized #12301
  • Windows bundle installation conditions are unlocalized #12300
  • Workload localization files are installed as flat layout #12298
  • .NET 6.0.100-rc.2.21505.57 installation location is missing on installation wizard within a clean Windows OS #12283

PullRequests

Created

  • Update baseline manifest authoring for localization dir #12302
  • Move Omnisharp fix to the correct place. #12297
  • Update TestConfig.xml #12296
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #12293
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add short source-build dev README #12292

Merged

  • [release/3.1.4xx] Backport x64 on ARM64 installer changes #12280
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/5.0.4xx] Backport x64 on ARM64 installer changes #12278
    Servicing-approved
  • Fix publish targets in vstest to eliminate prebuilts #12294
  • [6.0.1xx] dotnet/arcade: Disable Workloads WiX dependency in source-build to remove prebuilt #12290
  • Remove source-build obsolete bootstrapping patches #12287
  • Add support for targeting Windows version 22000 #12258
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • Add support for targeting Windows SDK 10.0.22000.0 #12276
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add some additional distros to the CI matrix #12141
  • Handle workload manifests as text-only packages in source-build #12271
  • Add support for targeting Windows SDK 10.0.22000.0 #12275
